title: Ep. 27 :: Learning How To Play Defense
itunes:title: Learning How To Play Defense
description: Simon Black, founder of the Sovereign Man blog discusses the Euro, China and overseas markets. Richard Suttmeier, chief market strategist at Niagara International Capital, talks about the positives and negatives of financial regulation.
content:encoded: Simon Black, founder of the Sovereign Man blog discusses the Euro, China and overseas markets. Richard Suttmeier, chief market strategist at Niagara International Capital, talks about the positives and negatives of financial regulation.
